# getBlockWithTransactions() function

Get a specific block (with the transactions contained in it) from a given network.

## Example

```javascript
const block = await getBlockWithTransactions({
  network: "ethereum",
  block: 12345678,
});
```

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function getBlockWithTransactions(
  params: GetBlockWithTransactionsParams,
): Promise<BlockWithTransactions>;
```

## Parameters

| Parameter | Type                                                                      | Description |
| --------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ----------- |
| params    | [GetBlockWithTransactionsParams](./sdk.getblockwithtransactionsparams.md) |             |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;BlockWithTransactions&gt;

the block for the given block number / block tag
